SLASH_DESC: Select the user you want to give a card to
SLASH_DESC2: Enter the code of the card that you want to give away
NO_SELF_GIVE: {{author}} You cannot give a card to yourself
NO_CODE: {{author}} You forgot to provide a card code
NO_CARD_FOUND: Could not find any card with the code: `{{code}}`
CARD_SELECTED: The card is selected and non-transferrable
CARD_LOCKED: That card is locked and cannot be given away! Use the command `{{prefix}}ut <CardCode>` to remove that card's `Tag`
CARD_NOT_OWNED: You do not own that card anymore
